testcase.name: CardException when adding a duplicate card to a hand
CardException when discarding from an empty hand
Hands created with correct numbers of cards
CardException when dealing from an empty deck
Hand creation fails if too many cards
contains() works correctly for a deck
Correct string representation of a hand

failure.message: org.gradle.internal.exceptions.DefaultMultiCauseException: Multiple Failures (3 failures) java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: is "AC" but: was "A♣" java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: is "AC 3D" but: was "A♣ 3♦" java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: is "AC 3D 5H 7S 9C" but: was "A♣ 3♦ 5♥ 7♠ 9♣"

testcase.name: Cards can be added to a deck
Cards can be added to a hand
isEmpty() works correctly for full and empty decks
CardException when adding to a full hand
discardTo() returns cards to a deck
size() works correctly for full and empty decks
